title: Basic Starter Kernel - NCAA Men's Dataset 2019
description: OverviewThis is a starter notebook inspired by the 2017 Logistic Regression on Tournament Seeds by Kasper P. Lauritzen starter kernel. It creates a basic logistic regression model based on the seed differences between teams. Note that the predictions for Stage 1's sample submissions file are already based on known outcomes, and the Tourney data this model is trained on includes that data. For Stage 2, you will be predicting future outcomes based on the teams selected for the tournament on March 17.
